description: A platform built on the MCP ecosystem, leveraging mem0 to maintain memories from various sources.

project: MemExtract - Mining User Preferences from Conversations
description: This project systematically processes raw conversation data, applying topic segmentation, summarization, and semantic similarity to identify and merge related content. It then uses LLMs to mine implicit user preferences, which are subsequently integrated and persisted via memory SDKs like mem0 or Zep.
